descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=4][FONT=Arial Black][CENTER]RA ENB[/CENTER][/FONT][/SIZE]

[CENTER][IMG]https://scontent-b-kul.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10301360_263131937199761_3567895679575902586_n.jpg[/IMG][/CENTER]

[SIZE=3][CENTER]Welcome[/CENTER][/SIZE]
welcome to my humble enb preset for Climate of Tamriel and Enhanced Lights and FX, its not the most beatiful enb nor best performance but at least its my perfect enb for me and my laptop performance. I just want to share my enb, so endorse if you like it.
english is not my native language, so I'm sorry if you find bad grammars and else.

[SIZE=3][CENTER]Required file[/CENTER][/SIZE]
1. lastest ENBSeries by Boris Vorontsov
2. [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates Of Tamriel[/URL] by JJC71
3. [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/URL] by Anamorfus

[SIZE=3][CENTER]Requirements setting[/CENTER][/SIZE]
skyrim.ini
[ImageSpace]
bDoDepthOfField=1
[Display]
fGamma=1.2500
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

[SIZE=3][CENTER]Instalation[/CENTER][/SIZE]
1. Download and Extract lastest ENBSeries
2. pick betwen wraper and injector (choose injector if you use laptop), and copy to your skyrim main folder
3. Download and Extract RA ENB
4. pick choose quality preset, copy all preset contents inside preset folder to your skyrim main folder, and overwrite everithing
5. copy ini files to DocumentsMy GamesSkyrim. its optional
6. Download Climates Of Tamriel
7. instal Climates Of Tamriel, choose default experience to cave, interior, and night option
8. Download and instal Enhanced Lights and FX
9. instal Enhanced Lights and FX, install core, enhancer interior, and exteriors

[SIZE=3][CENTER]Recommended[/CENTER][/SIZE]
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27022/?]Supreme Storms[/URL] by MannyGT
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/?]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather Patch[/URL] by prod80 - Aiyen - Saerileth - use level 3 night
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32644/?]Beautiful Skyrim Galaxy and Nebula[/URL] by HXP
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/URL] by Nebula
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM[/URL] by Brumbek
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51069/?]Realistic Aspen Trees[/URL] by AceeQ
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3812/?]TreesHD_Skyrim_Variation[/URL] by namotep
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul by vurt[/URL] by vurt
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51543/?]Unbelievable Grass HD[/URL] by AceeQ
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/URL] by isoku
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?]Watercolor for ENB and Realistic Water Two[/URL] by paganmetalfan
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]SkyFalls and SkyMills[/URL] by SjoertJansen
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2692/?]Cinematic Fire Effects 2 HD[/URL] by Ichibu

[SIZE=3][CENTER]changelog[/CENTER][/SIZE]
v1.1
-less bright day sky
-more bright night sky
-better performance medium quality
-better graphic low quality but still better performance
-new very low quality
